content: for anyone wanting to learn simple two-color brioche the basic brioche headband is a wonderful place to start it s quick and warm as well as a perfect practice piece before you dive into more complicated brioche techniques using scraps of two colors in a dk weight yarn you can easily make one for everyone on your gift giving list bust your stash and gain this exciting knitting skill brioche is a two-stitch repeat that is far simpler than it looks by working one color at a time and therefore working each round twice - once over the knits and once over the purls you create striking reversible vertical stripes with an excellent squish factor **supplies** 15-20 grams each of contrasting dk weight yarns model shown in kelbourne scout us6 4mm 16 cable tapestry needle stitch marker **gauge** 7 sts & 10 row to 2 x2 5 cm x 5 cm in two color brioche rib **circumference** approximately 21 around
